attributes.action: Make parental alienation a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
There are so many Mother's and fathers in this world that want to be good, present parents that, however, are being kept from their children. Due to their ex partner being spiteful and not thinking about the children's best interests nor the repercussions of their actions on the children's mental wellbeing, And the same goes for the parent who is being alienated.
I cannot stress enough that the psychological effects of such actions can render a child's ability to grow and thrive properly
attributes.background:
Please can the government and parliament look to make Parental alienation a criminal offence.
This topic affects Mother's, father's and also the people that are at the utmost importance, children. 
This form of abuse doesn't only affect the parent but also the child e.g Stunted development ect

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the below:

Make parental alienation a criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/659034
